data.name: Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin Original Soundtrack comes to Steam! Enrich your speakers with the colorful tunes of the latest RPG in the Monster Hunter series.

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
